metadata.title: CVE-2023-40533 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An uninitialized memory use vulnerability exists in Tinyproxy 1.11.1 whileparsing HTTP requests. In certain configurations, a specially crafted HTTPrequest can result in disclosure of data allocated on the heap, which couldcontain sensitive information. An attacker can make an unauthenticated HTTPrequest to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tinyproxy package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
